summary: I’ve had an incredibly busy and stressful week at work but I don’t have any meetings until noon tomorrow, so I think I’m going...
body: I’ve had an incredibly busy and stressful week at work but I don’t have any meetings until noon tomorrow, so I think I’m going to try to stay up and watch all of tonight’s Critical Role just out of spite for the amount of work I’ve done this week.

reblog.comment: I’ve had an incredibly busy and stressful week at work but I don’t have any meetings until noon tomorrow, so I think I’m going to try to stay up and watch all of tonight’s Critical Role just out of spite for the amount of work I’ve done this week.

summary:
missmelindamay replied to your post “So, apparently there‘s a shipping war going on.
Why tho... It's 2019 why aren't we done...
body:
missmelindamay replied to your post “So, apparently there‘s a shipping war going on. Why tho…

It’s 2019 why aren’t we done with t h o s e.

Exactly. Why can’t it ever be different people like different things (and yes, that includes the cast and the characters of CR)?

In the words of Brian W. Foster:

Don’t forget to love each other.

blog.name: bleu-bee
blog.title: And the Stars Fall like Raindrops
blog.description: Duck • 20 • they/she/he • big ol lesbian • single •

summary: Another CR dream
body:
Another CR dream

Heads up tonight’s ep will probably be very good!

I had another dream about the cr cast! Matt was dming for Laura, Sam, myself, and dream npcs down in a nice basement after school. It was a really great time and instead of being nervous and fucking up I was actually confident and Laura helped me again where she could. Don’t know what that means in dream turns but it feels v cool.

At one point Sam started talking like Nott and both Laura and I were the woman saying Beyoncé gif and Matt was just like guys… he can sounds however he wants.

Eventually we had to move to another location but Marisha was there! Not much happened except for we were both startled by a t-posing Snow White. Soooooo look out for Disney and also tonight’s so could get wild
